title: Well 2 games worth of testing... and this is the feature I love the most
body:
This is freaken MAJESTIC, the art looks so amazing blown up in front of me as I choose to partner with my favourite champion!

Sorry this isn't really contributing to bugs and stuff, but holy... 100% amazing riot.

replies.body: I really enjoy this, although it looks kind of bad with Star Guardian Janna, it's very close to her face where the art looks a little sloppy. If it were zoomed out a bit more it looks fine.
It's the best feature in the whole client.
Did your screen play the champion's music or sounds when you selected? When I had DJ Sona it was animated and had the music. I love the new design too!
now that you mention it, yeah I got the music and the champ select quote. it played DJ sona's music, sick!
OH I have to try this with DJ Sona now. But also yeah 10/10 design <3
